name: Kung Fury: Street Rage
description: JOIN KUNG FURY IN THE VOICE-ACTED ARCADE BEAT ‘EM UP STORY OF THE CENTURY!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 8 (32/64-bit)/Windows 7/Vista/XP Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9c compatible video card with minimum 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I only bought the game to show my appreciation of that awesome movie. Great work!
STRUCK BY LIGHTNING AND BITTEN BY A COBRA
